attributes.action: make Billericay, Essex the new capital city of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Billericay is a semi-rural town with many green spaces including Norsey Wood, Mill Meadows Nature Reservice and Queens Park Country Park. With a relatively small population of around 40,000 residents - I propose that Billericay become the new capital city of the United Kingdom.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
